nodes.bodyText: Should this be static? Or does each override it?

Javadoc.
Should this also be an abstract class?

Suggested change

Javadoc
Javadoc. Maybe explain how you replicated what was in the docker-compose file.
white space
How is this different then the method in CAContainer?
It appears that you set this value in CAContainer... do we need this one? This value is somewhat ghosting the one in CAContainer.

Rename to DOCKER image? May want to comment that you create this one as part of replicating docker-compose with a GenericContainer.
I wonder if WebSphere has it's own docker hub we could use?
We also probably need instruction on how you created your image.
I see you set this in the construct. This field is confusing since it ghosted statically in the child classes. They won't all agree, which could be confusing.
Javadoc
javadoc
Whitespace and javadoc
javadoc
Javadoc.
Don't use fail. Throw an IllegalStateException. We don't want to assume everyone is using these in JUnits.

I wasn't really expecting both PebbleContainer and CAContainer to extend CAContainer. My expectation was that the There would be a new class that would wrap both the PebbleContainer and ChalltestsrvContainer that would extend the CAContainer. This class would then call through appropriately.
Again, I expected a wrapper class to extend CAContainer and to contain the Pebble and Challtestserv containers.
Probably rename this file. What is this file for?
